snippet: Wright State has fired Coach Billy Donlon, who in his six seasons could not lead the Raiders into the N.C.A.A. tournament.
abstract: Wright State fires its men's college basketball coach Billy Donlon after failing to lead team into NCAA tournament for sixth consecutive year.
lead_paragraph: Wright State has fired Coach Billy Donlon, who in his six seasons could not lead the Raiders into the N.C.A.A. tournament.

headline.main: Coach Billy Donlon Is Fired by Wright State
headline.print_headline: Donlon Is Fired by Wright State
